title: srI naaradha gururaaya
sahitya:
shrI nArada gururAya gaNTi mEnATi tapamO gururAya

anupallavi

 manasAra kOriti gururAya nEDu kanulAra ganugoNTini gururAya

caraNam 1

 mI sEva dorikenu gururAya bhava pAshamu dolagenu gururAya
   
caraNam 2

 nIvE su-jnAna sukhi gururAya nIvE ajnAna shikhi gururAya
   
caraNam 3

 rAjillu vIne gala gururAya tygarAjuni brOcina sadgururAya
